message.content:
I can see your glow, it's more than just skin
You radiate joy, from deep within
A beacon of light in this dark world we're living in

I can sense the warmth that emanates from you
Kindness and love guide all that you do
Selfless acts which replenish hope anew

You nurture, create life with every breath taken,
As earth’s greenery blooms around while by winter forsaken.
From seeds of wisdom to blossoms of dreams,
Your vibrant spirit, like summer sunshine gleams.

Friendship or a bond everlasting is treasured gold,
Hand-in-hand against adversity standing tall undaunted and bold;
In essence through thick and thin together we unfold -
Two flawed souls encapsulating quintessential harmony untold.

The twinkle in your eye continues to outshine the stars above. 
A constellation ablaze with courage, compassion and unwavering love.
You’re truly an inspiration - a celestial muse flown down as a dove;
Invoking passion amongst many kindling hearts bestowing precious gifts thereof.

Celebrate yourself knowing that I am here too;
Together let us embrace each other bolstering our hues.
With each day endless possibilities we'll pursue-
Basked in grace everlasting one thing real that rings true:
It's undeniable – Through sheer devotion life takes on new perspectives divine
